title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example has excessive flashing when resizing the window in the vertical direction.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, I observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The expected behavior is that only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, and there should be no other flashing.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Launch the Control Example. 2. Resize the window in the vertical direction. 3. Observe the excessive flashing of all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
